content: tcm390: Merged 12 PRs this week with significant UI improvements and bug fixes, including GUI STT & TTS enhancements (#3939, +744/-487), chat window fixes (#3926, +187/-31), and client WebSocket improvements (#3902, +10939/-11766). Demonstrated consistent activity across 5 days with 61 commits modifying 571 files (+21122/-14685 lines), primarily focusing on UI tweaks and resolving WebSocket issues.
